trends: There have been 83 other sightings in Omaha
There was one other sighting in Omaha on or around July 4th 2009
divs: sighting detailswhile sitting on our back deck watching fireworks in the area i first saw one reddish-orange sphere, appeared to be glowing or burning, at aprox. 300-500 feet above the ground, traveling silently south-southeast at estimated 20-30 mph. no change in altitude or direction; no sound. followed about 8-10 seconds by another similar object...same altitude, heading, speed. seen during fireworks in neighborhood, but these were not fireworks, since they were moving at a consistant speed\altitude\direction. i only saw 2 objects but a neighbor reported seeing 3 in succession. i initially thought they could be fireworks, then i thought they could possibly be parachute flares drifting along in the wind, but they didn't change altitude (i'm unsure of what the wind direction\speed was at the time of the observation). i was puzzled at what i saw, being an experienced aviation enthusiast\spotter.
